overview:
John Goscha holds a B.S. in Economics and Entrepreneurship from Babson College. He is the founder of IdeaPaint, Inc. and has served in this role since the product’s inception in 2003. John lead the company through product development, launch and two rounds of financing totaling $6mm. IdeaPaint is now distributed in 10 countries.

John was named to Inc Magazine’s 30 Under 30 and BusinessWeek’s list of 25, 25 and Under in October, 2009.

Prior to IdeaPaint, John worked at KRG Capital Partners LLC as a private equality analyst. He was also the founder of Goscha Golf from 1997 to 2001, which created custom golf clubs, most notably a club design that became the #1 club in the United States and is currently utilized by Taylor Made Golf Company.
